element.title: On M5-branes in N=6 Membrane Action
element.location: LD::documents/On M5-branes in N=6 Membrane Action (Terashima).pdf
element.abstract: In this note we study M5-branes in the multiple membrane action which is recently proposed by Aharony-Bergman-Jafferis-Maldacena. We write down the N=6 supersymmetry transformation of the action and obtain 1/2 BPS equations and their solutions. They are expected to represent membranes ending on a M5-brane. We also consider the M5-M2 bound state in the action.
element.remarks: Comments: 12 pages; v2: references added, comments added, BPS solutions for N>2 are given; v3: corrected typos; v4: version to appear in JHEP; v5: comments for the convention of the spinors added
